title: News for February, 2024
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:newspaper]]
[[div class="pseudocrumbs" style="text-align: center"]]
**[[[news|Site News Hub]]]**
**¬´ [[[news-01-2024|January 2024]]] | __[[[news-02-2024|February 2024]]]__ | [[[news-03-2024|March 2024]]] ¬ª**
[[/div]]

[[span class="placard"]][[size 75%]] **DISCLAIMER:** This is the Site News for the English Branch of the SCP Wiki. The opinions of the individual members of the Site News team that are presented in each edition of the Site News are their own thoughts and are not meant to be representative of the Site News team as a whole nor are they representative of the staff body as a whole. If you take issue with any of the contents, then feel free to reach out to the editor(s) and they will review the contents to see if there are any edits that need to be made. We intend to always deliver interesting content to you, and we understand that there may be times where controversial or unpopular opinions will be presented whether by our writers or our editor(s). Thank you for your understanding![[/size]][[/span]]

[[div class="anchor"]]
[[div class="tocbox"]]
[[div class="toc-u"]]
[[toc]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="breaker"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Editorial
[[/div]]

Another K-Con has graced us with its presence! AS 7k slots come to a close, it is time for the contest to determine SCP-8000! The theme for this contest is Fantasy! Posting opens on February 12th, and closes on February 19th, while results are decided on March 11th. You can check out the rules on the 8000 contest hub [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp8000contesthub|here]]].

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By DianaBerry//[[/span]]
[[/>]]
------

It's time for the 2024 community survey! Every year, SCP staff puts out a survey to be able to learn about the demographics of the SCP Community. Please take a moment to fill it out if you get a chance, and the results will be posted once the survey is complete! It can be found [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfy8yNU8ev9mMrSZaD9UUqu-18PSThFAtB1x4ReNS17UvpQSw/viewform here].

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By ParallelPotatoes//[[/span]]
[[/>]]
------

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Writing Prompts
[[/div]]

Site News is bringing you monthly writing prompts! Every month there will be user-submitted prompts to help inspire new pieces. Participation in these prompts is completely optional, and any pages based on the prompts will be featured in the next issue of Site News! If you're interested in submitting a prompt for next Site News, send a wikidot PM to [[*user ParallelPotatoes]]. One prompt submission per person, and up to five prompts will be shown in each edition of Site News.

This month's writing prompts are below!

[[size x-large]]Babylon[[/size]] //Submitted by Lostinthewoods//
Write about a story set in Babylon and how it connects to the larger anomalous world!

[[size x-large]]Abnormally Normal[[/size]] //Submitted by psychicprogrammer//
In contrast with 8kcon's fantasy theme, write about something that's so normal that it's strange to see!

If you write an entry inspired by this or a previous month's prompts, feel free to send a wikidot PM to [[*user ParallelPotatoes]] to have it featured in the next Site News! There isn't a time limit on getting prompt submissions featured, so feel free to write for a previous month's prompts as well! [[footnote]]Please note than in the event of an official contest, contest entries that were inspired by a Site News prompt will be featured the month after the contest ends.[[/footnote]]
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Features Last Month
[[/div]]

[[=]]
+++ Top Articles of the Month
[[/=]]

Ratings of course do not mean everything, but they are representative of what people happened to like seeing at the time. With this in mind, the following are the top-rated works last month, so if by some chance you haven't encountered them yet, be sure to check them out!

[[div class="f-flex"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Top-Rated SCP
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-7186]]] by //J_V_G//: **Rock and Stone**

{{"Maybe we would have better luck covering this thing up if we actually knew what it was. Let me hire some real geologists so I can let my team do their jobs."}}

[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Top-Rated Non-SCP
[[/=]]

[[[a-modest-proposal-for-a-revised-anomaly-classification-syste|A Modest Proposal for A Revised Anomaly Classification System]]] by //Djoric//

{{I propose the following: in order to sever the last remaining ties of ACS to functionality, we must cut it entirely from the English language and its purse of stolen words.}}

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

-----

[[=]]
+++ Front Page Features
[[/=]]

Every month, an article is selected from each of the three common article types: SCP, Tale, and Group of Interest Format. These three articles are displayed on the front page for the month to bring further recognition to them.

[[=]]
//If you would like to view the previous front page features, you can view the archive for the SCPs [[[featured-scp-archive-ii | here]]], the archive for the Tales [[[featured-tale-archive-ii | here]]], and the archive for the GoI Formats [[[featured-goi-format-archive | here]]]!//
[[/=]]

[[div class="f-flex three"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ SCP Article
[[/=]]

[[[scp-6838|SCP-6838]]] by //DukeCrusty//: **Light in the Woods**

{{A direct cause of death could not be determined.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Tale
[[/=]]

[[[brasilic-folklore-and-mythology|Brasilic Folklore And Mythology]]] by //Dr Leonerd//

{{Foundation mythologists have noted numerous similarities between Brasilic folklore and the wider Celtic canon, with such recurring themes as love, death, vengeance and betrayal.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ GoI-Format
[[/=]]

[[[critter-profile-francis|Critter Profile: Francis!]]] by //ratking666//

{{From photographs, it's hard to believe he even exists in our reality! He tends to look out of place compared to his surroundings, and there's a good reason.}}


[[/div]]
[[/div]]

------

[[=]]
+++ Reviewers' Spotlights
[[/=]]

Works are featured on the site‚Äôs front page as part of the Reviewers‚Äô Spotlight, which acknowledges the time and effort spent by forum reviewers helping other authors develop and edit and their works for the mainsite. Each month, community members are encouraged to nominate forum reviewers who have been both particularly helpful and active. Members of the Forum Criticism Team will then discuss the nominations, and select four prominent reviewers to choose the month‚Äôs Reviewers‚Äô Spotlight front-page features.

[[=]]
//If you would like to view previous spotlights, you can view the archive for them [[[reviewers-spotlight-archive | here]]]!//
[[/=]]

[[div class="f-flex"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 1st of January
[[/=]]

[[[afraid|Afraid]]] by //Angryman22// [Featured by //Eggshell97//]

{{I can feel myself fading, leaving everything.}}

[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 9th of January
[[/=]]
 
[[[SCP-3352]]] by //The Great Hippo// [Featured by //Zoobeeny//]

{{SCP-3352 is associated with a single rigid steel I-beam located in 476HF.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 17th of January
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-7630]]] by //cubeflix// [Featured by //teapet//]

{{‚ÄúI think you did one hell of a good job as a mother, given your‚Ä¶ situation.‚Äù}}

[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 25th of January
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-5173]]] by //Cyvstvi// [Featured by //Savanac//]

{{SCP-5173 refers to a gravitational singularity orbiting at the edge of the Oort cloud.}}

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ SCP Data & Trends
[[/div]]

All the goings-on of the site condensed into bite-sized takeaways! Is there a statistic or figure you would be interested in knowing? Let us know and we can feature it next time!
[[=]]
[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-1.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-2.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-3.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-4.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-5.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-6.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/feb2024-7.png]]

[[/=]]
Like before, we are still renovating this section. It will likely be a couple months, but we will soon have a nice little stats section here. In the meantime, please enjoy our monthly charts.

Also, what do __YOU__ want to see in the monthly stats section? Any data you want to know about? Please leave a comment about it in the Discussion page or use [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfTm7UWLqekHiapGYcbns0GAY1jtIB0Xy93FqQPxc2S2I-wVA/viewform this anonymous google form.]

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Data Analysis Team//[[/span]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ New Content this Month
[[/div]]

There is a multitude of wonderful works that are posted to the Wiki every month whether they be SCP articles, Tales, GoI Formats, Art pages, Author Pages, Essays, and more! Below, we have all of the creations for this month listed out by week and type (except for art pages, we did that earlier!) We have added little emojis next to articles that qualify to add some additional content. Below we have listed out the emojis we use and what they mean. Be sure to give them a look!

ü§ù = **Co-authored works** - It is always interesting to see the dynamics of how people work together!
üåê = **International works** - Articles translated from one of our international branches!
üíØ = **Articles rated at +100 and higher** - These are articles that have seen success and should be celebrated for it!
üìà = **SCP articles rated under +30 and Tales and GoI Formats rated under +20** - Let's show these a little love!
